alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Shelby; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 4:22PM CDT until June 17 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tuscaloosa County in west central Alabama... West central Shelby County in central Alabama... Northeastern Bibb County in central Alabama... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 421 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Bibb, or 14 miles north of Centreville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake View, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, Abernant, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, North Bibb, Bucksville, Marvel, Green Pond, Caffee Junction and Hebron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
